about_the_game:
Story
In the distant past, the prosperous Kingdom of Pluton possessed a mysterious and powerful artifact known as the "Crown," a symbol of peace and the heart of the kingdom. One ominous night, the Crown was stolen by a dark sorcerer. From that day on, the kingdom was shrouded in a perpetual snowfall, and monsters began to appear, bringing disaster to every village.

Although the king and nobles knew the cause of the calamities, they concealed the truth to prevent panic, leaving the ignorant populace in terror. The people blamed themselves for the divine wrath they believed they were witnessing. However, the real cause was the stolen Crown, whose power had ensnared the world in ice.

Thus, the kingdom was divided into two worlds: one where the truth was known and another where people struggled in darkness. This story follows the hidden truths and the heroes' quest to reclaim the lost Crown.

Gameplay
Monster Elimination: Use your chosen mercenary character to eliminate monsters.
Character Enhancement: Strengthen your character's abilities with rewards earned during adventures.
Party Formation: Form parties by contracting with mercenaries.
Skill Utilization: Use the skills of your party members. The more your party members grow, the stronger skills you can acquire.
Contracting the Right Mercenary
Unique Skills: Each mercenary character has unique skills and is assigned four random passive skills.
Finding the Right Character: Search for characters with the desired passive skills that match your playstyle.
Party Composition: You can form a party regardless of whether the mercenaries belong to the same class.
Mercenary Management: You can handle the growth and contract termination of mercenaries in the mercenary tab.
